title: CoinFi 24 Hour Volume Hits $65,465.00 (COFI)
content: CoinFi (CURRENCY:COFI) traded 0.7% higher against the US dollar during the 1-day period ending at 17:00 PM E.T. on June 2nd. CoinFi has a total market cap of $7.92 million and approximately $65,465.00 worth of CoinFi was traded on exchanges in the last day. During the last seven days, CoinFi has traded 4% lower against the US dollar. One CoinFi token can now be bought for about $0.0455 or 0.00000597 BTC on major cryptocurrency exchanges including IDEX, Kucoin and Gate.io.   Here’s how similar cryptocurrencies have performed during the last day:  Ripple (XRP) traded 4.4% higher against the dollar and now trades at $0.64 or 0.00008417 BTC. Stellar (XLM) traded 3.9% higher against the dollar and now trades at $0.30 or 0.00003901 BTC. IOTA (MIOTA) traded 1% higher against the dollar and now trades at $1.88 or 0.00024687 BTC. TRON (TRX) traded 5.5% higher against the dollar and now trades at $0.0609 or 0.00000799 BTC. NEO (NEO) traded 3.9% higher against the dollar and now trades at $56.55 or 0.00741909 BTC. Tether (USDT) traded 0.9% lower against the dollar and now trades at $0.99 or 0.00012998 BTC. VeChain (VEN) traded 10% higher against the dollar and now trades at $3.72 or 0.00048808 BTC. Binance Coin (BNB) traded 4.8% higher against the dollar and now trades at $14.68 or 0.00192586 BTC. Ontology (ONT) traded up 9.2% against the dollar and now trades at $7.67 or 0.00100615 BTC. Zilliqa (ZIL) traded 7.2% higher against the dollar and now trades at $0.12 or 0.00001546 BTC. CoinFi Profile CoinFi launched on January 26th, 2018. CoinFi’s total supply is 300,000,000 tokens and its circulating supply is 173,973,982 tokens. CoinFi’s official message board is medium.com/coinfi. CoinFi’s official Twitter account is @coin_fi and its Facebook page is accessible here. The official website for CoinFi is www.coinfi.com. CoinFi can be traded on the following cryptocurrency exchanges: Kucoin, Gate.io and IDEX. It is usually not possible to purchase alternative cryptocurrencies such as CoinFi directly using U.S. dollars. Investors seeking to acquire CoinFi should first purchase Ethereum or Bitcoin using an exchange that deals in U.S. dollars such as Changelly, GDAX or Gemini. Investors can then use their newly-acquired Ethereum or Bitcoin to purchase CoinFi using one of the exchanges listed above. Receive News & Updates for CoinFi Daily
